name: WestgateMall
0:
”Alexa, ask Westgate Mall what restaurants they have”
”Alexa, ask Westgate Mall what are the hours”
”Alexa, ask Westgate Mall if they have open job positions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: westgate mall
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Westgate Mall’s skill will let you know all the important information and happenings at the center. Whether you’re curious what type of stores they have, where to get a rideshare, when they will be closing, or what the next upcoming event is, download this skill to be informed on all things at Westgate Mall. You can access this skill on any of your Alexa devices.

To get started, enable Westgate Mall’s skill in the Alexa app, or by saying, “Alexa, open Westgate Mall.”

If you’re having trouble, please visit www.westgatemalltx.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
